test_cases.output:
This program takes a date in the year 2025 and can perform two operations.
Enter day (1-31): Enter month (1-12): 

The operations are:
	1. Find what day of the year it is (e.g., Jan 1 is day 1, Dec 31 is day 365)
	2. Find what day of the week it is (Monday, Tuesday, etc.)
Choose an option (1-2): 
 ~~~ The day of the year is: 1 ~~~
